nodes.text: Amara Kel's Rules for TIE Pilot Survival (Probably)

"Amara Kel's Rules for TIE Pilot Survival (Probably)" is a short story that was published in the 2020 anthology book From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back. It was written by Django Wexler and focuses on the TIE pilot Amara Kel.
